issues.info: @nwo5 on discord or github issues, complain about performance and the threat in readme applies to u :3

indicator-type.name: Type
indicator-type.description: (every mode will use individual lines for triggers) 'individual lines' draws well, individual lines to objects, 'rect' draws a rectangle around all objects, 'clustered' divides objects into, well, clusters, not that complicated you can figure it out i believe in you :3

only-selected.name: Only Selected
only-selected.description: only show indicators for selected triggers/objs

only-triggers.name: Only Triggers
only-triggers.description: only show trigger to trigger connections

only-spawn.name: Only Spawn
only-spawn.description: only triggers only show spawn connected triggers instead of all triggers with that id

collision-ids.name: Collision IDs
collision-ids.description: this is kinda maybe sorta laggier so off by default

max-distance.name: Max Distance
max-distance.description: max distance between objects to draw indicators (without selecting)

cluster-size.name: Max Cluster Distance
cluster-size.description: when clustering, any neighbours further than this will form their own cluster instead of joining one

cluster-max-threshold.name: Cluster Max Threshold
cluster-max-threshold.description: maximum amount of objects for clustering, any more and rect gets used (set to a low-ish number for performance)

group-blacklist.name: Group Blacklist
group-blacklist.description: you can input more groups like, '1,2,3,4,5'

trigger-blacklist.name: Trigger Blacklist
trigger-blacklist.description: you can input more trigger ids like, '1,2,3,4,5'

spawn-indicators.name: Enable Spawn Indicators
spawn-indicators.description: draw a circle around spawn triggered triggers like the box around touch triggered ones

settings-button-texture.name: Settings Button Texture
settings-button-texture.description: yes you have only pride flags

sayo-device-sensitivity.name: Sayo Device Sensitivity
sayo-device-sensitivity.description: new hardest acu 100% cbf 240hz sayo solid wave trail uldm jump from time machine first victor on the iss

cull-distance-multiplier.name: Cull Distance Multiplier
cull-distance-multiplier.description: less cull distance which is prolly bad unless u want selected objects to show their triggers from further

forced-trigger-blacklist.name: Forced Trigger Blacklist
forced-trigger-blacklist.description: mayb dont change this cuz it could break the mod but if ur feeling silly u can force the mod to try to handle these triggers
